means: 伯戈因，约翰((1722-1792) 英国将军和戏剧家。美国独立战争期间占领了泰孔德罗加要塞(1777年7月6日)，但于萨拉托加战役(1777年10月17日)中失守。<女继承人> (1786年)是他最受欢迎的剧本 )

sentence.Network_en: At the end of the meal Burgoyne was asked to propose a toast.
sentence.Network_cn: 用餐终了，伯戈因被邀请致祝酒词。

means.word_mean: 1. British general in the American Revolution who captured Fort Ticonderoga but lost the battle of Saratoga in 1777 (1722-1792)

auth_sentence.content: They gette the duke of Burgoyne in great desyre to make an armye into Englande.
auth_sentence.res_content: They gette the duke of Burgoyne in great desyre to make an armye into Englande.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They gette the duke of Burgoyne in great desyre to make an armye into Englande.
